Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mang07 "Mango7"
Reviews.Content: I love these batteries and they seem to last longer than the Fujifilm ones.The charger works well. Although I wished the design were slightly different: the electrical prongs could be on the other end -- when I take out the battery, it's easy to inadvertently pull the whole charger from the socket.  But otherwise, a very useful product!

Reviews.Title: Halcyon Batteries for FUJIFILM X-S1
Reviews.Author: Don Lewis "sperrier"
Reviews.Content: The price is right and I have had good results from other after-market camera batteries.  Too soon to tell until I have several charge cycles on them.  I needed a car charger also, so that was handy. Fits into the camera well; no problem being too thick as some others are.Good so far.

Reviews.Title: Fuji x100s batteries DO fit in this charger.
Reviews.Author: Dan Murano
Reviews.Content: Charging is a little slow (same as the Fuji charger), but they seem to last a long time. I'm glad I bought this - I had bought a different brand and had to tape the batteries down because they didn't fit in the charger - The Fuji batteries fit in this one.
